title: Still having the fullscreen problem
body: I saw that the warning on the fullscreen problem did go away. I though it was fixed, but, i still cant go fullscreen. I still need to play in window mode. Are you guys going to fix next patch?

replies.body:
Same problem dude, hope it gets fixed soon but you can never know with Riot. It might be fixed in the next few days or in the next few months, because it's not a game breaking issue (for every player)

EDIT: you should switch it from windowed to borderless mode, although it's kind of laggy (at least for me)

Ye , windowed and borderless makes high ms in game like 150 to 200 ms , i've still have the fullscreen issue too , its been 3 weeks for now till its up , what can i say , shame to the workers who proced this.

We deployed a fix for this issue that resolved the problem for some players, but we're still looking into a permafix for everyone. I'm not on the team that works on these fixes, so I'm unable to provide you an ETA on when you'll see that fix go out. For now, you'll want to avoid fullscreen mode until we've gotten that fix out. :/

If you have any other questions, let me know.
